title: Chat Room App
summary: Frontend Development: Created a dynamic chat platform using Next.js and React, ensuring intuitive navigation and a smooth user experience.
Type-Safe Development: Utilised TypeScript to ensure robust type safety and improve code maintainability across the application.
Styling and UI Design: Designed a responsive and visually appealing interface with Tailwind CSS, focusing on simplicity and user engagement.
Real-Time Communication: Integrated WebSocket functionality with Socket.IO to enable real-time messaging and dynamic room-based chat interactions.
Server Communication: Designed and implemented efficient communication between clients and the server for scalable and reliable messaging.
